test-set.name: app-spec-examples
test-set.description: Tests the example code in the F+O 4.0 specification

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-node-name-001
test-case.test:
let $e :=

One

Two

Three return node-name($e//*[@id = 'alpha'])

Three return type-of($e//*)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-string-008
test-case.test:
let $para := <para>There lived a <term author="Tolkien">hobbit</term>.</para>
return
string($para)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-data-004
test-case.test:
let $para := <para>There lived a <term author="Tolkien">hobbit</term>.</para>
return
data($para)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-data-005
test-case.test:
let $para := <para>There lived a <term author="Tolkien">hobbit</term>.</para>
return
data($para/term/@author)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-message-001

result.assert-deep-eq: If supported, might return the string "Vierzehnte".

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-concat-003
test-case.test: concat( 'Thy ', (), 'old ', "groans", "", ' ring', ' yet', ' in', ' my', ' ancient',' ears.' )

result.assert-deep-eq: "Thy old groans ring yet in my ancient ears."

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-string-length-001
fo-test-fn-normalize-space-001
test-case.test: normalize-space(" The wealthy curled darlings of our nation. ")

result.assert-deep-eq: "The wealthy curled darlings of our nation."

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-matches-004
test-case.test:
let $poem := <poem author="Wilhelm Busch"> Kaum hat dies der Hahn gesehen, Fängt er auch schon an zu krähen: Kikeriki! Kikikerikih!! Tak, tak, tak! - da kommen sie. </poem> return
matches($poem, "Kaum.*krähen")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-matches-005
test-case.test:
let $poem := <poem author="Wilhelm Busch"> Kaum hat dies der Hahn gesehen, Fängt er auch schon an zu krähen: Kikeriki! Kikikerikih!! Tak, tak, tak! - da kommen sie. </poem> return
matches($poem, "Kaum.*krähen", "s")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-matches-006
test-case.test:
let $poem := <poem author="Wilhelm Busch"> Kaum hat dies der Hahn gesehen, Fängt er auch schon an zu krähen: Kikeriki! Kikikerikih!! Tak, tak, tak! - da kommen sie. </poem> return
matches($poem, "^Kaum.*gesehen,$", "m")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-matches-007
test-case.test:
let $poem := <poem author="Wilhelm Busch"> Kaum hat dies der Hahn gesehen, Fängt er auch schon an zu krähen: Kikeriki! Kikikerikih!! Tak, tak, tak! - da kommen sie. </poem> return
matches($poem, "^Kaum.*gesehen,$")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-matches-008
test-case.test:
let $poem := <poem author="Wilhelm Busch"> Kaum hat dies der Hahn gesehen, Fängt er auch schon an zu krähen: Kikeriki! Kikikerikih!! Tak, tak, tak! - da kommen sie. </poem> return
matches($poem, "kiki", "i")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-replace-008
test-case.test: replace("In the beginning was the Word", "\b", "|")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-tokenize-002
test-case.test: tokenize("The cat sat on the mat", "\s+")

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-analyze-string-001
test-case.test: analyze-string("The cat sat on the mat.", "\w+")

result.assert-xml: <analyze-string-result xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><match> <group nr="1">A</group> <group nr="2">1</group> </match><non-match>,</non-match><match> <group nr="1">C</group> <group nr="2">15</group> </match><non-match>,,</non-match><match> <group nr="1">D</group> <group nr="2">24</group> </match><non-match>, </non-match><match> <group nr="1">X</group> <group nr="2">50</group> </match><non-match>,</non-match></analyze-string-result>

<analyze-string-result xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><match><lookahead-group nr="1" value="There" position="1"/></match><non-match>There </non-match><match><lookahead-group nr="1" value="we" position="7"/></match><non-match>we </non-match><match><lookahead-group nr="1" value="go" position="10"/></match><non-match>go</non-match></analyze-string-result>

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-001
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-002
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-003
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p, { 'namespaces': in-scope-namespaces($e/*) })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-004
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p, { 'indexes': false() })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-005
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p/@xml:lang)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-006
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e//@xml:lang, { 'namespaces': in-scope-namespaces($e/*) })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-007
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p/@author)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-008
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p/*:br[2])

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-009
fo-test-fn-path-010
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e//text()[starts-with(normalize-space(), 'Tochter')])

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-011
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p/*:br[2], { 'lexical': true() })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-path-012
test-case.test:
let $e := document {

Freude, schöner Götterfunken,
Tochter aus Elysium,
Wir betreten feuertrunken,
Himmlische, dein Heiligtum.

} return path($e/*:p/*:br[2], { 'lexical': true(), 'origin': $e/*:p })

let $names := ("Anna", "Barbara", "Catherine", "Delia", "Eliza", "Freda", "Gertrude", "Hilda") return
subsequence-where($names, to := starts-with(?, "D")) => trunk()

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-deep-equal-001
test-case.test:
let $at := <attendees> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> <name last="Barker" first="Bob"/> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> </attendees> return
deep-equal($at, $at/*)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-deep-equal-002
test-case.test:
let $at := <attendees> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> <name last="Barker" first="Bob"/> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> </attendees> return
deep-equal($at/name[1], $at/name[2])

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-deep-equal-003
test-case.test:
let $at := <attendees> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> <name last="Barker" first="Bob"/> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> </attendees> return
deep-equal($at/name[1], $at/name[3])

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-deep-equal-004
test-case.test:
let $at := <attendees> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> <name last="Barker" first="Bob"/> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> </attendees> return
deep-equal($at/name[1], 'Peter Parker')

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-deep-equal-005
test-case.test:
let $at := <attendees> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> <name last="Barker" first="Bob"/> <name last="Parker" first="Peter"/> </attendees> return
deep-equal( $at//name[@first="Bob"], $at//name[@last="Barker"], options := { 'items-equal': op('is') } )

fo-test-fn-deep-equal-013

fo-test-fn-serialize-001
test-case.test:
let $params := <output:serialization-parameters xmlns:output="http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization"> <output:omit-xml-declaration value="yes"/> </output:serialization-parameters>
return
let $data := <a b="3"/>
return
serialize($data, $params)

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-function-lookup-003
test-case.test: let $f := function-lookup( #zip:binary-entry, 2 ) return if (exists($f)) then $f($source, $entry) else ()

result.assert-deep-eq: The result of calling zip:binary-entry($source, $entry) if the function is available, or the empty sequence otherwise.

fo-test-fn-for-each-pair-003
test-case.test: let $s := 1 to 8 return for-each-pair($s, tail($s), fn($a, $b) { $a * $b })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-sort-by-006
test-case.test: sort-by( $employees, ({ 'key': fn { name/last }, 'collation': collation({ 'lang': 'se' }) }, { 'key': fn { xs:decimal(salary) }, 'order': 'descending' }))

result.assert-xml: <person name="Jade" age="6"/> <person name="Jie" age="8"/> <person name="Josipa" age="8"/>

fo-test-fn-csv-to-arrays-015

fo-test-fn-csv-to-xml-006
test-case.test:
let $crlf := char('\r') || char('\n') return
let $csv-string := `name,city{ $crlf }Bob,Berlin{ $crlf }Alice,Aachen{ $crlf }` return
csv-to-xml($csv-string, { "header": true() })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-csv-to-xml-007

result.assert-xml: <csv xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><columns><column>name</column><column>date</column><column>amount</column></columns><rows><row><field column="name">Bob</field><field column="date">2023-07-19</field><field column="amount">10.00</field></row><row><field column="name">Alice</field><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="amount">15.00</field></row><row><field column="name">Charlie</field><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="amount">15.00</field></row></rows></csv>

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-csv-to-xml-008

result.assert-xml: <csv xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><columns><column>date</column><column>name</column><column>city</column><column>amount</column><column>currency</column><column>original amount</column><column>note</column></columns><rows><row><field column="date">2023-07-19</field><field column="name">Bob</field><field column="city">Berlin</field><field column="amount">10.00</field><field column="currency">USD</field><field column="original amount">13.99</field></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Alice</field><field column="city">Aachen</field><field column="amount">15.00</field></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Charlie</field><field column="city">Celle</field><field column="amount">15.00</field><field column="currency">GBP</field><field column="original amount">11.99</field><field column="note">cake</field><field>not a lie</field></row></rows></csv>

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-csv-to-xml-009

result.assert-xml: <csv xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><columns><column>date</column><column>name</column><column>city</column><column>amount</column><column>currency</column><column>original amount</column><column>note</column></columns><rows><row><field column="date">2023-07-19</field><field column="name">Bob</field><field column="city">Berlin</field><field column="amount">10.00</field><field column="currency">USD</field><field column="original amount">13.99</field><field column="note"/></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Alice</field><field column="city">Aachen</field><field column="amount">15.00</field><field column="currency"/><field column="original amount"/><field column="note"/></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Charlie</field><field column="city">Celle</field><field column="amount">15.00</field><field column="currency">GBP</field><field column="original amount">11.99</field><field column="note">cake</field></row></rows></csv>

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-csv-to-xml-010

result.assert-xml: <csv xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions"><columns><column>date</column><column>name</column><column>city</column><column>amount</column><column>currency</column><column>original amount</column></columns><rows><row><field column="date">2023-07-19</field><field column="name">Bob</field><field column="city">Berlin</field><field column="amount">10.00</field><field column="currency">USD</field><field column="original amount">13.99</field></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Alice</field><field column="city">Aachen</field><field column="amount">15.00</field><field column="currency"/><field column="original amount"/></row><row><field column="date">2023-07-20</field><field column="name">Charlie</field><field column="city">Celle</field><field column="amount">15.00</field><field column="currency">GBP</field><field column="original amount">11.99</field></row></rows></csv>

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-006
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := 2, end := 5, step := 2)

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-007
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := 5, end := 2, step := -2)

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-008
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := 2, end := 5, step := -2)

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-009
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := 5, end := 2, step := 2)

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-018
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := -4, end := -2, step := 2)

test-case.name: fo-test-array-slice-019
test-case.test:
let $in := [ 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e' ]
return
array:slice($in, start := -2, end := -4, step := -2)

fo-test-fn-highest-001
test-case.test:
let $e := <a x="10" y="5" z="2"/> return
highest($e/@*) ! name()

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-highest-002
test-case.test:
let $e := <a x="10" y="5" z="2"/> return
highest($e/@*, (), string#1) ! name()

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-take-while-007
test-case.test: take-while(10 to 20, fn($num, $pos) { $num lt 18 and $pos lt 4 })

test-case.name: fo-test-fn-partition-004

fo-test-fn-jnode-position-001
fo-test-fn-jnode-position-002
test-case.test: let $input := { "a": {"x": 10, "y": 20, "z": 30}, "b": ( {"x": 40, "y": 50, "z": 60}, {}, {"x": 70, "y": 80, "z": (90, 100)}) } return $input / child::b / * ! { "position": jnode-position(), "key": jnode-selector(), "value": jnode-content() }
